title: Green Arrow v1 01-04 (1983|Digital|Son of Ultron-Empire)
description:
This is the first Green Arrow series written by Mike W. Barr, which led into the ongoing series under Mike Grell's direction. Though the Crisis on Infinite Earths reboot was only two years away, this served as a modern introduction to the character and is the template for all his post-reboot appearances since. 

Plot summary from ComicVine - "The Battling Bowman fought his way into his own four issue mini series at long last, thanks to Mike W Barr and Trevor Von Eeden.

When his old friend Abigail Horton passes away, Oliver Queen is forced to relive an infatuation from many years earlier with her daughter, Cynthia. Inheriting $34 million from Abigail, Ollie becomes a wanted man and the target of several assassination attempts. After facing his old foe Count Vertigo, Green Arrow finally discovers the person behind the attacks and Abigail's death."

These are the high-res digital copies by Son of Ultron-Empire. I have previously torrented the low-res rips as well so this supersedes those copies. Thanks to SoU_E for their work; please seed, and enjoy! :-)
